title: [Health] Long-term exposure to 835 MHz RF-EMF induces hyperactivity, autophagy and demyelination in the cortical neurons of mice

[Neuroscience] Fetal exposure to antidepressants or antiepileptic medications may affect the development of newborn brain networks..In the study novel mathematical methods were developed to allow future research on how commonly used drugs or other environmental conditions affect the newborn brain
